replies.body:
Always seems weird buying a champion with RP

Its all about the Skins, anyone else agree?
As someone who has only two champions left to unlock.. Yes, I agree; it seems like a waste of money to not have ground for IP in the past.
I don't own all champions but maybe lower the price of the champions in ip, instead of Rp?
Is headhunter {{champion:84}}  worth it? Now that is is on sale

If you like the Headhunter skin line I'd say it's a quality addition.

Check out the community Skin Spotlight to really help you decide if it's right for you:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ctkE4LXr6T4
Only if you like the skin
